languages.text: "Поскольку ласераксы используются для увеселений, на Тассере они живут недолго, и привозят их партиями — вот и "давным-давно". Право, иномирные бестии не такая интересная тема, поговорим о чем-то еще?"

traits.locale_text: "Что же касается самих вещиц, они прилетели к нам с Идес... Идекса, если мне не изменяет память. Последний раз их звездные корабли спускались к нам лет сто назад".

languages.text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"
languages.original_text: "Поскольку ласераксы используются для увеселений, на Тассере они живут недолго, и привозят их партиями — вот и "давным-давно". Право, иномирные бестии не такая интересная тема, поговорим о чем-то еще?"

traits.locale_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the ‘long ago'. Honestly, alien beasts are not that interesting a topic of conversation, Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

"Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

languages.text: “那些异虎是用来娱乐的，它们在塔瑟拉活不了太久。而且，它们之前是成批运过来的，所以也确实是很久以前的事情了。老实说，谈论来自遥远世界的牲畜，似乎并不是个有趣的话题。不如我们来谈些别的事情吧，好吗？”
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: “那些异虎是用来娱乐的，它们在塔瑟拉活不了太久。而且，它们之前是成批运过来的，所以也确实是很久以前的事情了。老实说，谈论来自遥远世界的牲畜，似乎并不是个有趣的话题。不如我们来谈些别的事情吧，好吗？”

languages.text: «Dado que los lacerax se utilizan con fines recreativos, no suelen durar mucho en Thassera, y nos traen remesas nuevas periódicamente, por eso digo que “hace mucho” que los tengo. A decir verdad, tampoco encuentro tan interesantes las bestias de mundos lejanos. ¿Le parece que cambiemos de tema?».
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: «Dado que los lacerax se utilizan con fines recreativos, no suelen durar mucho en Thassera, y nos traen remesas nuevas periódicamente, por eso digo que “hace mucho” que los tengo. A decir verdad, tampoco encuentro tan interesantes las bestias de mundos lejanos. ¿Le parece que cambiemos de tema?».

languages.text: "Laserakslar eğlence için kullanıldığından Thassera'da uzun süre dayanamazlar ve buraya gruplar hâlinde getirilirler. O yüzden 'uzun zaman önce' dedim. Dürüst olmak gerekirse uzak dünyalardan gelen hayvanlar o kadar da ilginç bir sohbet konusu değil. Başka bir şey konuşalım, olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: "Laserakslar eğlence için kullanıldığından Thassera'da uzun süre dayanamazlar ve buraya gruplar hâlinde getirilirler. O yüzden 'uzun zaman önce' dedim. Dürüst olmak gerekirse uzak dünyalardan gelen hayvanlar o kadar da ilginç bir sohbet konusu değil. Başka bir şey konuşalım, olmaz mı?"

languages.text: 「ラセラックスは、娯楽に使われるため、タッセーラでは長くは生きられず、群れで連れてこられるので、『昔』と言ったのです。正直言って、遠くの惑星から来た獣はおしゃべりの話題としては面白くないですね。何か他の話題を話しませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: 「ラセラックスは、娯楽に使われるため、タッセーラでは長くは生きられず、群れで連れてこられるので、『昔』と言ったのです。正直言って、遠くの惑星から来た獣はおしゃべりの話題としては面白くないですね。何か他の話題を話しませんか？」

languages.text: « Puisqu'ils sont utilisés pour le divertissement, les lacérax ne font pas long feu sur Thassera. Ils sont livrés par lots, d'où le "il y a bien longtemps". Très franchement, les créatures venant de mondes lointains ne font pas un sujet de conversation bien intéressant. Parlons d'autre chose, voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: « Puisqu'ils sont utilisés pour le divertissement, les lacérax ne font pas long feu sur Thassera. Ils sont livrés par lots, d'où le "il y a bien longtemps". Très franchement, les créatures venant de mondes lointains ne font pas un sujet de conversation bien intéressant. Parlons d'autre chose, voulez-vous ? »

languages.text: "Da Laceraxe der Unterhaltung dienen, leben sie auf Thassera nicht lang und werden immer in großen Gruppen beschafft. Daher das 'vor langer Zeit'. Offen gestanden sind Tiere aus fernen Welten kein sonderlich interessantes Gesprächsthema. Reden wir über etwas anderes, ja?"
languages.original_text: "Since laceraxes are used for entertainment, they do not last long on Thassera, and they are brought in batches, hence the 'long ago.' Honestly, beasts from faraway worlds are not that interesting a topic of conversation. Let us talk about something else, shall we?"

traits.locale_text: "Da Laceraxe der Unterhaltung dienen, leben sie auf Thassera nicht lang und werden immer in großen Gruppen beschafft. Daher das 'vor langer Zeit'. Offen gestanden sind Tiere aus fernen Welten kein sonderlich interessantes Gesprächsthema. Reden wir über etwas anderes, ja?"
